content.html:
The following patch fixes the warning about implicit cast from "int" to "float":

diff -r 24893ea8ad0a media/materials/programs/deferred_rendering/ssao_fp.glsl
--- a/media/materials/programs/deferred_rendering/ssao_fp.glsl  Mon Oct 07 19:46:24 2013 -0700
+++ b/media/materials/programs/deferred_rendering/ssao_fp.glsl  Tue Oct 08 16:21:10 2013 -0700
@@ -84,7 +84,7 @@

     // this is a sample occlusion function, you can always play with
     // other ones, like 1.0 / (1.0 + zd * zd) and stuff
-    occ += clamp(pow(1.0 - zd, 11) + zd, 0.0, 1.0);
+    occ += clamp(pow(1.0 - zd, 11.0) + zd, 0.0, 1.0);
   }

   occ /= 6.0;
